project.teaser: The COMP-ECO key objective is to improve the research excellence in the field of fiber-reinforced polymer multifunctional composites and smart structures of the Polish Mazovia region-based ecosystem formed by TPF, AFIT, and WUT, and to create a sustainable network for...
project.title: STRENGTHENING MAZOVIAN MULTIFUNCTIONAL COMPOSITE ECOSYSTEM THROUGH A HOLISTIC APPROACH AND A STRATEGIC ALLIANCE WITH EUROPEAN LEADERS
project.keywords: Multifunctional composites, Smart materials, Fibre Reinforced Polymers, Structural health monitoring, Sensor integration, Lightweight structures design, Research excellence, S&T cooperation, Knowledge

category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: Report and Materials from Workshop on preparing for Horizon Europe and other funding schemes, and on proposal writing
result.description: The deliverable will contain selected materials prepared for and generated during the Proposal writing and funding schemes workshop and which could be used for further trainings of staff and students of the consortium partners, but also disseminated externally.

result.title: Report and Materials from Workshop on commercial. and patenting strategies
result.description: The deliverable will contain selected materials prepared for and generated during the Commercial and patenting strategies workshop and which could be used for further trainings of staff and students of the consortium partners, but also disseminated externally.

result.title: Dissemination & Exploitation Plan including Communication
result.description: Deliverable containing a comprehensive list of planned activities related to communication with internal and external stakeholders, dissemination of Project’s results and their exploitation. It will be a living document, regularly updated.

result.title: Report and Materials from Workshop on DESIGN
result.description: The deliverable will contain selected materials prepared for and generated during the Design workshop and which could be used for further trainings of staff and students of the consortium partners, but also disseminated externally.

result.title: Report and Materials from Workshop on Project Management and Administration
result.description: The deliverable will contain selected materials prepared for and generated during the Project mgmt.. and administration workshop and which could be used for further trainings of staff and students of the consortium partners, but also disseminated externally.

result.title: Report and Materials from Workshop on MANUFACTURING
result.description: The deliverable will contain selected materials prepared for and generated during the Manufacturing workshop and which could be used for further trainings of staff and students of the consortium partners, but also disseminated externally.

result.title: Quality assurance and risk management plan
result.description: Set of procedures to ensure quality of deliverables and successful implementation of WPs and tasks.

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: The project is expected to produce a large set of data which management in a fair and transparent manner, following EC guidelines requires a specific organisation and management plan – the Data Management Plan. Special attention will be paid to dissemination, exploitation and IPR.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
